main event: A civilian in Centerville, Texas reported a flash of light illuminating the windows of her house and heard a loud roar, but no UFO was sighted.
interesting points: The observer reported a sudden flash of light and a loud roar, indicating a potentially significant event.
Despite the visual and auditory phenomena, the report states that no UFO was actually sighted.
The lack of further information and the absence of a photograph contribute to the mystery surrounding the incident.
The report mentions that nothing unusual was picked up on radar, adding to the ambiguity of the event.
Scattered thunderstorms were present in the area, potentially impacting the atmospheric conditions and contributing to the reported phenomena.
sighted object: flash of light illuminating house windows and loud roar
